name: StandardSetController

constuctors.name: StandardSetController
constuctors.description: Creates an instance of the ApexPages.StandardSetController class for the list of objects returned by the query locator.

constuctors.name: StandardSetController
constuctors.description: Creates an instance of the ApexPages.StandardSetController class for the specified list of standard or custom objects.

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Returns the PageReference of the original page, if known, or the home page.

methods.name: first
methods.description: Returns the first page of records.

methods.name: getCompleteResult
methods.description: Indicates whether there are more records in the set than the maximum record limit. If this is false, there are more records than you can process using the list controller. The maximum record limit is 10,000 records.

methods.name: getFilterId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the filter that is currently in context.

methods.name: getHasNext
methods.description: Indicates whether there are more records after the current page set.

methods.name: getHasPrevious
methods.description: Indicates whether there are more records before the current page set.

methods.name: getListViewOptions
methods.description: Returns a list of the listviews available to the current user.

methods.name: getPageNumber
methods.description: Returns the page number of the current page set. Note that the first page returns 1.

methods.name: getPageSize
methods.description: Returns the number of records included in each page set.

methods.name: getRecord
methods.description: Returns the sObject that represents the changes to the selected records. This retrieves the prototype object contained within the class, and is used for performing mass updates.

methods.name: getRecords
methods.description: Returns the list of sObjects in the current page set. This list is immutable, i.e. you can't call clear() on it.

methods.name: getResultSize
methods.description: Returns the number of records in the set.

methods.name: getSelected
methods.description: Returns the list of sObjects that have been selected.

methods.name: last
methods.description: Returns the last page of records.

methods.name: next
methods.description: Returns the next page of records.

methods.name: previous
methods.description: Returns the previous page of records.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Inserts new records or updates existing records that have been changed. After this operation is finished, it returns a PageReference to the original page, if known, or the home page.

methods.name: setFilterID
methods.description: Sets the filter ID of the controller.

methods.name: setpageNumber
methods.description: Sets the page number.

methods.name: setPageSize
methods.description: Sets the number of records in each page set.

methods.name: setSelected
methods.description: Set the selected records.

description: Creates an instance of the ApexPages.StandardSetController class for the list of objects returned by the query
